{{refimprove|date=September 2009}} {{Infobox_Broadcast | call_letters = DWDJ-TV | city = [[Baguio City]] | station_logo = | station_slogan = ''Oras-oras, alam ko!'' | station_branding = ''GMA News TV-22 Baguio'' | analog = 22 ([[UHF]]) | affiliations = [[GMA News TV]] | former_affiliations = [[Q (TV network)|Q Network]] (2005-2011) | location = Baguio City | owner = [[GMA Network, Inc.]]
[[ZOE Broadcasting Network]] | sister_stations = [[DWZB-TV]] ([[GMA Network]]) | homepage = [http://www.wmn.ph/qtv www.wmn.ph/qtv]| }} '''DWDJ-TV''' 22 is a [[television station]] of the [[Philippines|Philippine]] [[television network]] [[GMA News TV]] in Baguio. The station's [[studio]] is located in GMA-10 at #16 Kisad Rd. 2nd Floor Midland Currier Building, [[Baguio City]] and [[transmitter]] at Lamut, Benguet. ==See also== *[[List of broadcasters owned or affiliated with GMA Network#GMA News TV|List of GMA News TV stations]] [[Category:GMA News TV stations]]
